code: import{i18n}from"@lingui/core";import React,{useContext}from'react';import{Title}from'@patternfly/react-core';import{WorkflowDispatchContext}from'contexts/Workflow';import LinkModal from'./LinkModal';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function LinkAddModal(){var dispatch=useContext(WorkflowDispatchContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LinkModal,{header:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{headingLevel:"h1",size:"xl",children:/*i18n*/i18n._("Add Link")}),onConfirm:function onConfirm(linkType){return dispatch({type:'CREATE_LINK',linkType:linkType});}});}export default LinkAddModal;
